children.name: Cyral - Data Activity Logs Standard Dashboard
children.title: Cyral - Data Activity Logs Standard Dashboard

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"repo.name")

($$logsrc )
| json "sidecar.name","repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"sidecar.name")

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.repoUser","repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.repoUser")

($$logsrc )
| json "client.connectionId","repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| timeslice
| count_distinct(%"client.connectionId") by _timeslice
| avg(_count_distinct)

($$logsrc )
| json "client.host","repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup latitude, longitude from geo://location on ip=%"client.host" 
| count by latitude, longitude
| sort _count

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser")

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.group")

panels.title: Number of Users in each SSO Group

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser") by %"identity.group"

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser") by %"repo.name",%"identity.group"
| transpose row %"repo.name" column %"identity.group" as *

($$logsrc )
| json "client.connectionId","response.bytes","repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count_distinct(%"client.connectionId") as Connections, count as Queries, avg(%"response.bytes") as averageQuerySizeInBytes by %"repo.name"
| round(averageQuerySizeInBytes, 2) as averageQuerySizeInBytes

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| timeslice
| count by _timeslice, %"repo.name"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"repo.name"

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","client.connectionId","response.executionTimeNanos" nodrop
| json "identity.group" as SSOGroup nodrop
| json "identity.group" as SSOUser nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataSetAccessed
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count as NumberOfQueries, count_distinct(%"client.connectionId") as NumberOfConnections, avg(%"response.executionTimeNanos") as AverageExecutionTime by dataSetAccessed, SSOGroup, SSOUser

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName" nodrop
| json "identity.group" as SSOGroup nodrop
| json "identity.group" as SSOUser nodrop
| json "request.datasetsAccessed[*].dataset" as dataSetAccessed
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and SSOUser matches "{{SSO_User}}" and SSOGroup matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| count as NumberOfQueries by dataSetAccessed

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "*"
| count by ActivityCategory, %"identity.group"
| transpose row ActivityCategory column %"identity.group"

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "*"
| timeslice
| count by _timeslice, ActivityCategory
| transpose row _timeslice column ActivityCategory

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory, ActivityTerm as ActivityTerm from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "Privileged Commands"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser") by ActivityTerm

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory, ActivityTerm as ActivityTerm from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup"on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "Privileged Commands"
| count by ActivityTerm,%"identity.group"
| transpose row ActivityTerm column %"identity.group" as *

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes[*]" as activityType
| json "policyViolated" as policyViolated
| json "repo.name"
| where activityType IN ("[\"query\"]","[\"authenticationFailure\"]","[\"portScan\"]") and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| if(activityType="[\"query\"]" and policyViolated="true", "cyralPolicyTriggered", activityType) as activityType
| where activityType IN ("cyralPolicyTriggered","[\"authenticationFailure\"]","[\"portScan\"]")
| count by activityType, %"repo.name"
| transpose row %"repo.name" column activityType

($$logsrc )
| json "activityTypes[*]" as activityType
| json "policyViolated" as policyViolated
| json "repo.name"
| where activityType IN ("[\"query\"]","[\"authenticationFailure\"]","[\"portScan\"]") and %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}"
| if(activityType="[\"query\"]" and policyViolated="true", "cyralPolicyTriggered", activityType) as activityType
| where activityType IN ("cyralPolicyTriggered","[\"authenticationFailure\"]","[\"portScan\"]")
| count by activityType, %"repo.name"
| transpose row %"repo.name" column activityType as *

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group"
| json "response.executionTimeNanos" as executionTimeNanos
| json "client.connectionId" as connectionId
| json "activityTimeNanos" as activityTimeNanos
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| (executionTimeNanos/1000000) as executionTimeInMS
| withtime activityTimeNanos
| avg(executionTimeInMS) as avg_executionTimeInMS, count, most_recent(activityTimeNanos_withtime) as first_timeNS, least_recent(activityTimeNanos_withtime) as last_timeNS by %"repo.name", connectionId  
| (first_timeNS-last_timeNS) as connectionTimeInNS
| (connectionTimeInNS/1000000) as connectionTimeInMS
| count(connectionId) as connectionsPerPeriod, avg(connectionTimeInMS) as averageConnectionDuration, avg(_count) as averageQueriesPerConnection, avg(avg_executionTimeInMS) as averageQueryCompletionSpeed by %"repo.name"

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statement","response.isError" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| if(%"response.isError"=="true", 1,0) as errorCount
| count AS totalQueriesOverTimeframe, sum(errorCount) AS countOfResponseWithErrors by %"repo.name"
| ((countOfResponseWithErrors/totalQueriesOverTimeframe)*100) as percentOfQueriesWithError
| round(percentOfQueriesWithError, 2) as percentOfQueriesWithError

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statement","response.isError" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| if(%"response.isError"=="true", 1,0) as errorCount
| timeslice
| sum(errorCount) by _timeslice, %"repo.name"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"repo.name"

panels.title: Activity Categories With Highest Error Rates

queries.queryString:
($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statement","request.statementType","repo.type","response.isError" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| if(%"response.isError"=="true", 1,0) as errorCount
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "*"
| count as totalQueriesOverTimeframe, sum(errorCount) as countOfResponseWithErrors by ActivityCategory
| ((countOfResponseWithErrors/totalQueriesOverTimeframe)*100) as percentOfQueriesWithError
| round(percentOfQueriesWithError, 2) as percentOfQueriesWithError
| sort by percentOfQueriesWithError

($$logsrc )
| json "identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| json "request.fieldsAccessed[*].field" as fieldAccessed nodrop
| json "repo.name" as Repository
| json "repo.type" as repositoryType
| json "identity.repoUser" as repositoryUser
| json "identity.endUser" as SSO_User
| json "client.applicationName" as clientApplication
| json "response.bytes" as sizeOfTransaction nodrop
| json "response.executionTimeNanos" as queryCompletionTime nodrop
| json "client.connectionId" as connectionId
| json "activityTime" as activityTime
| where Repository matches "{{repo_name}}" and clientApplication matches "{{clientApplication}}" and SSO_User matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityTerm as ActivityTerm from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| if(isBlank(fieldAccessed), "Unknown", fieldAccessed) as fieldAccessed
| max(queryCompletionTime) by fieldAccessed, repositoryUser, SSO_User, clientApplication, ActivityTerm, Repository, repositoryType, queryCompletionTime, sizeOfTransaction, activityTime
| sort by _max

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","client.connectionId" nodrop
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| timeslice
| count_distinct(%"client.connectionId") by _timeslice, %"repo.name"
| transpose row _timeslice column %"repo.name"

($$logsrc )
| json "action", "details.approver"
| where action = "data-access.admin-approval"
| count by %"details.approver"

($$logsrc )
| json "action", "details.repo"
| where action = "data-access.admin-approval"
| count by %"details.repo"

($$logsrc )
| json auto
| where %"action" = "data-access.admin-approval"
| max(timestamp) by %"details.approver", %"details.requester", %"details.repo", %"details.localAccount", %"details.duration", %"timestamp"
| fields -_max
| sort by %"timestamp" desc

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory, ActivityTerm as ActivityTerm from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup" on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "Access Changes"
| count_distinct(%"identity.endUser") by ActivityTerm

($$logsrc )
| json "repo.name","client.applicationName","identity.endUser","identity.group","request.statementType","repo.type"
| where %"repo.name" matches "{{repo_name}}" and %"client.applicationName" matches "{{clientApplication}}" and %"identity.endUser" matches "{{SSO_User}}" and %"identity.group" matches "{{SSO_Group}}"
| lookup ActivityCategory as ActivityCategory, ActivityTerm as ActivityTerm from path://"/Library/Admin Recommended/CategoryLookup"on %"request.statementType"=StatementType, %"repo.type"=RepoType
| where ActivityCategory matches "Access Changes"
| count by ActivityTerm,%"identity.group"
| transpose row ActivityTerm column %"identity.group" as *
